name: Lovu Lovu BLAST - Xmas Castle (Dezue)
description:
Heyho, you funky sexy Arcade Santa!
Five christmas princesses in your area are wating for your Lovu Lovu! It's time to prepare your Lovu Lovu Cannon! ;)

Welcome to the updated version of Lovu Lovu Blast! Thanks for all your feedback and suggestions.
This version has an adjusted gameplay difficulty and - of course - more lewds! Enjoy :)

 Thanks for playing, merry christmas and stay funky,
